title: Lets upvote this post so we can remind Riot!
body:
Last year someone named ‚Äú Silvarspark‚Äù posted a Devil Shaco skin and he got 274 upvotes and the community loved it , but nobody from Riot seems to care .

http://orig12.deviantart.net/5f7e/f/2017/147/8/e/demon_shaco_by_shockowaffel-dbamlp3.jpg

http://orig13.deviantart.net/47e5/f/2017/147/1/8/demon_shaco_box_by_shockowaffel-dbammaf.jpg

Halloween is coming so i want us to remind Riot that they have a skin on the plate and the community wants it .

I need ur help guys , if we upvote the post Rioters can see it and even if they dont respond (like usual) maybe they can think about making it . 

Lets be honest the skin is gorgeous and it fits him perfectly , we can make it happen if we unite and upvote the post and maybe just maybe a Rioter will respond or think about making it . He doesnt have any 1350+ skins , but damn man this skin looks legendary 1820 and i would glady pay for it ,the skin is too good. He needs a good quality one and this is a good chance.
 
If the skin would come in a bundle with Devil Shaco skin , Devil Shaco icon and ward i would buy it in 2 seconds.

                                   Lets do this guys!  The community is strong xD

Exactly my bro.

Not trying to be an ass, but Rioters probably noticed that there are these fan-made skins that the community wanted to make official. And they probably wanted it to be a thing as well! 
But it's not like the 'design, etc.' teams have nothing to do all day. They probs already have more skins coming along to work on, and they'll see these as 'it's cool, but it'll just make a whole lot more work for us, so it's probably best not to do anything about it right now'.
And who knows? Maybe these skins will be officially made later on.
The thing is that Shaco is high on the VGU list,so it is rather unlikely for him to get a high quality skin until he receives said VGU.

They can make the skin and after the rework they can adjust/redesign it , i dont see this a problem.

Having to adjust/redesign it will cost a lot of work and in the worst case scenario,they'd have to completely remake the entire skin.

I mean just look at {{champion:3}}s legendary skin.
They were unable to reuse anything from the old skin.
The new model did not support the old one,so they couldn't reuse the model and since all of Galios skills changed it meant that they had to redo all the skills for the skin from scratch.

Also remaking the skin works not just against riot,but also against the players. Imagine buying the skin because you really like its design and then shaco gets remade and you don't like the design,meaning that you'd be stuck with a skin that you don't like.

I'm sure that they do. Shaco {{champion:35}}  has **TONS** of Skin Potential, A Demonic Entity taking the form of a Jester/Marionette. No doubt that Demon Shaco is an awesome concept. Only thing stopping Riot from acting on this is the fact Shaco is currently a Tier-1 VGU, this is why he's not getting any skins for the time being (If they made this skin now, they'd have to redo/redesign it around the New Shaco when his VGU arrives). This was why Swain's {{champion:50}} Dragon Master was delayed for so long & why Urgot {{champion:6}}  hasn't gotten jack. Both of these champions had to be visually redesigned before they recieved anything, Shaco would be no different. Once Shaco has been relaunched, they can start making skins for him again.

As for when they'll actually make a skin for Leagues Favorite Clown? That's a mystery only Riot's Skins team can solve.
